ParticlesSystem

Class ParticlesSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • ParticlesSystem.ParticlesSystem

  • public class ParticlesSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    A particles' System is a mechanical 2D system which contains free and tied up particles.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update()
        Update the whole particle's System (each particle position)

      • setGridParticlePosition

        protected void setGridParticlePosition(int i,
                           int j,
                           GridParticle particle)
        Set up in the outGridMatrix the particle position scaled to FluidParticleSimulation.GL_...
        Parameters:
        i - Column's index of the particle
        j - Line's index of the particle
        position - Position of the particle scaled by ParticlesSystem.ENGINE_...

      • setFreeParticlePosition

        protected void setFreeParticlePosition(int index,
                           FreeParticle particle)
        Set up in the outFreeMatrix the particle position scaled to FluidParticleSimulation.GL_...
        Parameters:
        i - Line's index in outFreeMatrix
        x - Abscissa of the particle scaled by ParticlesSystem.ENGINE_X
        y - Ordinate of the particle scaled by ParticlesSystem.ENGINE_Y

      • setParticleInitPosition

        protected void setParticleInitPosition(int i,
                           int j,
                           float initX,
                           float initY)
        Set up in the initGridMatrix the particle position scaled to FluidParticleSimulation.GL_...
        Parameters:
        i - Column's index of the particle
        j - Line's index of the particle
        initX - Initial abscissa of the particle scaled by ParticlesSystem.ENGINE_X
        initY - Initial ordinate of the particle scaled by ParticlesSystem.ENGINE_Y

      • addFreeParticles

        public void addFreeParticles(float x,
                    float y,
                    int nbToAdd)
        Add nb free particles in the system at the indicates position
        Parameters:
        x - Abscissa of the position to add particles scaled by ParticlesSystem.ENGINE_X
        y - Ordinate of the position to add particles scaled by ParticlesSystem.ENGINE_Y
        nbToAdd - Number of particles to add

        public void genFreeParticles()

      • hasGridParticles

        public boolean hasGridParticles()
        Determine if the system has at least one tied up particle
        Returns:
        true if at least one tied up particle exists, false otherwise

      • hasFreeParticles

        public boolean hasFreeParticles()

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Reset the particle system. Free particles will be cleared and tied up particles will be restored to initial position

        Properly destroy the system

      • getStiffness

        public float getStiffness()
        Getter : stiffness
        Returns:
        La constante de raideur de ressort appliquée aux particules du système.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getMomentum

        public float getMomentum()
        Getter : momentum
        Returns:
        La pondération du moment appliquée aux particules du système. Le moment est un le déplacement aléatoire d'une particule.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getFriction

        public float getFriction()
        Getter : friction
        Returns:
        Pourcentage de frottement appliqué aux déplacements des particules du système. 0% = libre, 100% = immobile
        Since:
        1.0

      • getSeuilMin

        public float getSeuilMin()
        Getter : seuilMin
        Returns:
        Seuil en deça duquel les particules du système seront considérées comme immobiles.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getSeuilMax

        public float getSeuilMax()
        Getter : seuilMax
        Returns:
        Seuil au dessus duquel les particules du système seront limités.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getMemory

        public int getMemory()
        Getter : memory
        Returns:
        Nombre de positions à mémoriser pour le tracé du déplacement des particules libres du système.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getMagnetForce

        public float getMagnetForce()
        Getter : MagnetForce
        Returns:
        Current magnet force
        Since:
        1.0
